LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowCasings_Desc: Firing weapons will display a dropped casing effect.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_CreateCasingsFilth_Desc: Firing weapons will create cleanable filth of dropped casings.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_StuckArrowsAsFlecks_Desc: Certain projectiles, such as arrows, will create a temporary visual fleck on the ground where they impact.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowTaunts_Desc: Pawns will display text-based taunts during combat.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_AllowMeleeHunting_Desc: Hunters will still be allowed to hunt if they have a melee weapon equipped.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_SmokeEffects_Desc: Fire generates dangerous black smoke clouds, causing health complications to anyone not wearing protective gear.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_MergeExplosions_Desc: Nearby explosions are merged into each other, significantly improving performance during a massive explosives cook-off. Strongly recommended to leave on.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_TurretsBreakShields_Title: Disable shield belts while manning turrets
LanguageData.CE_Settings_TurretsBreakShields_Desc: When enabled, shield belts will deactivate while colonists are manning turrets. If disabled, shield belts will instead remain active, offering additional protection.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowBackpacks_Desc: Enables / Disables the rendering of backpacks (all pawns)
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowWebbing_Desc: Enables / Disables the rendering of tactical vests (all pawns)
LanguageData.CE_Settings_PartialStats_Desc: When turned on some armor might have different stats on different body parts
LanguageData.CE_Settings_RecoilAnim_Desc: When enabled, ranged weapons and turrets will play recoil animations when they fire.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_EnableAmmoSystem_Desc: Weapons require ammunition to reload and can use various specialized ammo types.\n\nWARNING: Changing this setting on an existing colony may cause bugs and instability, do so at your own risk.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_GenericAmmo_Desc: Instead of using full caliber system use several generic calibers, while retaining ammo types and ammo system. (requires game reload)
LanguageData.CE_Settings_RightClickAmmoSelect_Desc: Right-clicking the reload button brings up the ammo selection menu.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_AutoReloadOnChangeAmmo_Desc: Pawns will automatically reload when a new ammo type is selected.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_AutoTakeAmmo_Desc: Pawns without loadouts assigned will automatically pick up ammo for their equipped weapon.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowCaliberOnGuns_Desc: Ammunition-using weapons will have their caliber appended behind their name.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ReuseNeolithicProjectiles_De: Neolithic projectiles will have a chance to drop on the floor on impact. They are automatically forbidden.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_RealisticCookOff_Desc: Ammunition stacks won't spawn damaging projectiles on cooking off.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowExtraTooltips_Desc: Enables extra tooltips for the cell under the mouse pointer (hold left-shift to view).
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ShowExtraStats_Desc: Enables extra (internal, redundant, or confusing) stats in some info cards.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_FragmentsFromWalls_Desc: If true, damaging walls can generate fragments
LanguageData.CE_Settings_FasterRepeatShots_Desc: If true, subsequent shots at the same, or nearby, targets are faster.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_EnableExtraEffects_Desc: Bullets and other projectiles will display additional effects, such as bullets kicking up dust or incendiaries throwing sparks. Cosmetic only, does not affect gameplay.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_BipodMechanics_Desc: Some weapons will be equipped with bipods, giving penalties when not set up and slight bonuses when set up.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_BipodAutoSetUp_Desc: Weapons with bipods will automatically start setting up when not set to snapshot.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_PatchArmorDamage_Desc: Vehicle Armor reduces damage based on relative values, but can be penetrated by high AP attacks..
LanguageData.CE_Settings_VerboseAutopatcher_Desc: This will enable verbose logging of the autopatcher
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ApparelAutopatcher_Desc: Attempt to apply an appropriate apparel preset to the armor values of unpatched apparel.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_RaceAutopatcher_Desc: The autopatcher will apply a preset to unpatched races to allow basic functionality.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_WeaponAutopatcher_Desc: Attempt to apply an appropriate weapon preset to unpatched ranged weapons.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_ToughnessAutopatcher_Desc: Apply an automatically calculated toughness stat to weapons, which affects how much damage they recieve when used in melee.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_PawnkindAutopatcher_Desc: Give unpatched pawnkinds equipped with a patched ranged weapon a small amount of ammunition.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_GenericRestartPopup: Toggling generic ammo mode requires a full restart to apply.\n\nWould you like to restart now?
LanguageData.CE_Settings_EnableCIWS_Desc: Allows some turrets to function as Close-In Weapon Systems, capable of intercepting incoming hostile projectiles and/or drop pods.
